name: Centralize
headline: The all-in-one deal workspace for high ACV revenue teams
description: Centralize helps revenue teams operationalize multithreading and drive warm pipeline. Reps at companies like Sendoso, mParticle, and Navattic use us to automatically map stakeholders, track evolving account priorities, and fill contact gaps by leveraging their networks for warm intros.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Rachit Kataria, Founder
founders.description: Rachit is the co-founder and CEO of Centralize, the all-in-one deal workspace for high ACV revenue teams. Prior to Centralize, he was the product tech lead at AtoB (YC S20) and built the foundations of their partner-funded discounts and telematics fraud suite. Before that, he was a founding engineer on Facebook Shops and helped scale the product to hundreds of millions of MAUs. He's originally from the Bay Area and received a BS / MS in CS from the University of Southern California.

founders.name: Will Wang, Founder
founders.description: Will is the co-founder and CTO of Centralize, the all-in-one deal workspace for high ACV revenue teams. Prior to Centralize, Will started the prototyping team at Slack & led the initial launch of Huddles, the fastest growing product in Slack history. He also led engineering & product for Clips, Save For Later, Lists & other experimental verticals. Will was also the 1st engineer at Capture, where he built much of the product from the ground up.

generated_description:
**Centralize: Your New Go-To for Revenue Teams**

Founded in 2023 and nestled in the bustling startup hub of San Francisco, Centralize is the brainchild of a small team of four, operating under the auspices of Y Combinator's Batch W24. Their mission is straightforward yet powerful: to serve as the all-in-one deal workspace for high Annual Contract Value (ACV) revenue teams.

### What They Do

Centralize initially aimed to help revenue teams navigate the complexities of multithreading. Think of it as giving sales reps the tools they need to build warmer pipelines with ease. Companies like Sendoso, mParticle, and Navattic have already embraced this platform, utilizing it for automating stakeholder mapping, tracking account priorities, and leveraging networks for warm introductions. This is not just a tool; it's a lifeline for sales professionals who want to remain competitive in today’s fast-paced environment.

### Features That Stand Out

1. **Automated Research**: Collect real-time insights from sources like 10-Ks and LinkedIn, saving your team countless hours.
   
2. **Relationship Intelligence**: Aggregate insights from calls and emails to ensure no important contact is ever missed.

3. **Network-Led Introductions**: Use your existing connections to secure warm leads from day one.

4. **Job Change Notifications**: Get alerts on key personnel changes within your buyer's committee—because timing matters in deal risk assessment.

5. **Dynamic Call Strategies**: AI-driven strategies that fine-tune your approach before every call, prioritizing the needs of each stakeholder.

6. **Seamless Integration with CRM**: With effortless syncing to tools like Salesforce, they ensure your team spends more time engaging with customers and less time on data entry.

### Who's It For?

Centralize caters to a diverse audience within the Go-To-Market (GTM) landscape:

- **Sales Reps** benefit by identifying and nurturing buyer committees in real time.
  
- **Sales Leaders** get an overview of every opportunity without getting bogged down in metrics.

- **Marketing Teams** can align efforts on Account-Based Marketing (ABM), driving more targeted campaigns.

- **Account Managers** rapidly pinpoint cross-sell and upsell opportunities based on customer interactions.

- **Customer Success Teams** maintain valuable insights on stakeholder engagement to ensure lasting customer loyalty.

### Getting Onboard

If you're looking to transform the way your sales team operates, Centralize is ready to help you ramp up. The pitch is simple: book a demo and see for yourself how you can exceed your quotas as a unified team.

For more insights into Centralize and how it could work for you, check out their website at [Centralize](https://www.usecentralize.com).

In a world where data is essential, Centralize offers a crucial edge—a comprehensive view that empowers revenue teams to not just meet targets but exceed them with finesse. This could be one of the best investments you make in your sales operations.
